---
title: "Smoky tofu tortillas"
author: "[Jane Hornby](https://www.bbcgoodfood.com/recipes/smoky-tofu-tortillas-1)"
categories: [vegan, lunch]
description: "A quick filling for lunches"
---

- 1 onion
- 1 pepper
- 2 tsp ground cumin
- 1 tsp hot smoked paprika
- 200g pack smoked tofu
- 400g can tacos mixed beans
- 1 tbsp dark brown soft sugar
- 1 tbsp tomato puree

1. Fry onion and pepper in spices
1. Add tofu
1. Add beans, sugar a puree

Makes enough for 5 - 6 wraps.
Serve with chopped cabbage or avocado and lime.
